item.title: 特朗普的大型减税计划可能因债券市场的谨慎而放缓
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的共和党人承诺在明年完全控制美国国会后将加大油门，几乎没有什么能阻止他们执行当选总统削减税收和重整全球贸易格局的承诺。【原文：Donald Trump's Republicans are promising to hit the gas next year when they assume full control of the U.S. Congress, with little to stop them from executing the president-elect's promises to slash taxes and reorder the global trade landscape.】

item.title: 聚焦：投资者挖掘新数据，预测零售商业绩
item.description: 在一些人预计会令人失望的节假日来临之际，高盛等华尔街投资者正在使用新的方法来监控购物者的行动和意图，以帮助确定本季度的赢家和输家。【原文：Heading into holidays some expect to disappoint, Wall Street investors like Goldman Sachs are using new ways to monitor shoppers' actions and intentions to help determine the season's winners and losers.】

item.title: 圭亚那选择美国新创公司开采巨大天然气储量面临障碍
item.description: 圭亚那选择了一家名不见经传的美国初创公司来设计和开发项目，使其尚未开发的大量天然气资源货币化，而这些项目的成本可能高达 300 亿美元。 成立一年之久的 Fulcrum LNG 公司面临着融资障碍，这可能会影响它的选择。最终，这个南美国家可能会依赖埃克森美孚牵头的财团，该财团控制着南美所有的天然气生产。【原文：Doubts are growing over Guyana's pick of a little-known U.S. startup to craft and develop projects to monetize its vast untapped natural gas resources that could cost up to $30 billion. Year-old Fulcrum LNG faces financing hurdles that could derail its selection. Ultimately, the South American nation may end up relying on a consortium led by Exxon Mobil , which controls all the production in the】

item.title: 谷歌网络广告帝国案美国反垄断审判接近尾声
item.description: 美国司法部将于周一就谷歌非法主宰在线广告技术进行最后论证，以寻求对该公司的第二次反垄断胜利。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice will make its final argument on Monday that Google illegally dominated online advertising technology, seeking a second antitrust win against the company.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普准备制定广泛的能源计划，以促进天然气出口和石油钻探
item.description: 据两位熟悉该计划的消息人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普的过渡团队正在制定一个范围广泛的能源方案，将在他上任后几天内推出，该方案将批准新液化天然气（LNG）项目的出口许可，并增加美国沿海和联邦土地上的石油钻探。【原文：Donald Trump's transition team is putting together a wide-ranging energy package to roll out within days of his taking office that would approve export permits for new liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects and increase oil drilling off the U.S. coast and on federal lands, according to two sources familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 新任财政部长值得关注的五张关键图表
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，他将提名斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任第79任美国财政部长，并为当选总统的激进经济政策打头阵。【原文：Donald Trump on Friday said he would nominate Scott Bessent to be the 79th U.S. Treasury secretary and frontman for the president-elect's aggressive economic policies, a slate that financial markets already anticipate will add to economic growth in the near term but also rekindle inflation.】

item.title: 道指期货创历史新高，市场盛赞特朗普的财政部长人选
item.description: 受投资者对斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）被提名为财政部长的乐观情绪推动，道指合约周一触及纪录高位，领涨美国股指期货。【原文：Dow contracts touched a record high on Monday, leading gains among U.S. stock index futures, fueled by investor optimism over Scott Bessent's nomination as Treasury Secretary.】

item.title: 苹果供应商康宁在欧盟反垄断调查中提出放弃排他性交易
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，美国抗碎玻璃制造商康宁公司已主动提出放弃与手机制造商的所有排他性协议，以消除人们对其可能存在的反竞争行为的担忧。【原文：The European Commission on Monday said U.S. maker of break resisting glass Corning had offered to waive all exclusive deals with mobile phone manufactures to address concerns over possible anticompetitive behaviour.】

item.title: 空中出租车公司 Vertical 称 Mudrick 将把部分票据转换为股权，并延长还款期限
item.description: 英国垂直宇航公司（Vertical Aerospace）周一表示，投资者穆德里克资本（Mudrick Capital）已同意将其50%的未偿还可转换债务票据转换为股权，并将其余票据的偿还日期延长至2028年12月，从而为这家资金短缺的空中出租车制造商提供了财务喘息空间。【原文：UK-based Vertical Aerospace said on Monday that investor Mudrick Capital has agreed to convert 50% of its outstanding convertible debt notes to equity and extend the repayment date on the rest to December 2028, giving the cash-strapped air-taxi maker financial breathing room.】

item.title: 美国敲定授予 BAE 系统公司和火箭实验室半导体芯片合同
item.description: 美国商务部周一表示，将最终确定向 BAE 系统公司提供近 6000 万美元的政府补贴，用于制造喷气机和卫星使用的芯片，以及向火箭实验室提供补贴，用于制造卫星和航天器使用的化合物半导体。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Monday it is finalizing nearly $60 million in government subsidies for BAE Systems to build chips used in jets and satellites, and for Rocket Lab to build compound semiconductors used in satellites and spacecraft.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，奥地利与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司长达半个世纪的合作因天然气被没收而终止
item.description: 五位消息人士告诉路透社，本月早些时候结束俄罗斯国有能源巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）与 OMV 长达 50 多年天然气流通的导火索是这家奥地利集团扣押了俄罗斯天然气，作为支付仲裁裁决价值的款项。【原文：The trigger that ended more than 50 years of gas flows from Russian state energy giant Gazprom to OMV earlier this month was the Austrian group's seizure of Russian gas as payment to cover the value of an arbitration award, five sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注电力，扎堆材料行业，高盛集团称
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）称，截至上周五的一周内，全球对冲基金以两个月来最快的速度抛售了美国电力和水务公司股票，同时买入了美国化工、金属和矿业等材料类股票以及造纸和森林类股票。【原文：Global hedge funds sold U.S. electric and water utilities stocks at the fastest pace in two months while buying U.S. materials stocks such as chemicals, metals and mining as well as paper and forest shares in the week to Friday, Goldman Sachs said.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司表示不会为阿达尼集团的投资提供新的资金支持
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）周一表示，鉴于美国联邦政府对阿达尼公司负责人及其侄子的起诉，道达尔能源公司将不再为其对阿达尼集团公司的投资提供新的资金支持。【原文：TotalEnergies SE said on Monday that it will not make any new financial contribution as part of its investments into the Adani group of companies amid a U.S. federal indictment against the head of the company and his nephew.】

item.title: Expansion 称，Blackstone 将于 2025 年初将西班牙 Cirsa 股份在马德里上市
item.description: 据当地报纸 Expansion 周一援引未具名市场消息人士的话报道，私募股权投资者 Blackstone 计划于 2025 年上半年将西班牙博彩公司 Cirsa 的股票首次公开发行上市。【原文：Private equity investor Blackstone plans to list shares of Spanish gambling company Cirsa in the first half of 2025 in an initial public offering, local newspaper Expansion reported on Monday, citing unidentified market sources.】

item.title: 比亚迪称明年将推出新一代叶片电池
item.description: 据中国国家媒体 CGTN 周六报道，中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪表示，将于 2025 年推出新一代叶片电池。【原文：China's electric vehicle giant BYD said it will launch a new generation of blade batteries in 2025, Chinese state media CGTN reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 英美资源集团同意以高达 37.8 亿美元的价格向皮博迪能源公司出售澳大利亚煤矿
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）周一同意将其澳大利亚炼钢煤矿出售给皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy），现金对价高达 37.8 亿美元。【原文：Anglo American on Monday agreed to sell its Australian steelmaking coal mines to Peabody Energy for a cash consideration of up to $3.78 billion, in its first major disposal as part of a wider restructuring plan.】

item.title: 中国商务部副部长会见英伟达高管
item.description: 中国商务部表示，中国商务部副部长王受文周一在北京会见了英伟达全球现场运营执行副总裁 Jay Puri。【原文：Wang Shouwen, China's vice commerce minister, met with Jay Puri, an executive vice president of Nvidia's worldwide field operations, in Beijing on Monday, China's Ministry of Commerce said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：债券反弹，美元因国债选择而下挫
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行提出以 105.7 亿美元收购 BPM 银行
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）周一表示，它已提出收购竞争对手 Banco BPM 银行，股票交易价值约为 100.9 亿欧元（105.7 亿美元）。【原文：Italian lender UniCredit said on Monday it had offered to buy rival Banco BPM in a stock deal valued at about 10.09 billion euros ($10.57 billion).】

item.title: DHL 货运飞机在维尔纽斯机场附近坠毁，造成一死两伤
item.description: 机场、警察和消防人员告诉路透社，一架 DHL 货运飞机于格林尼治标准时间周一 3 时 30 分左右在立陶宛维尔纽斯机场附近坠毁，造成一人死亡，两人受伤。【原文：A DHL cargo plane crashed near Lithuania’s Vilnius airport on Monday at about 0330 GMT, killing one person and injuring two others, airport, police and firefighter officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 面对喜忧参半的 COP29 气候信息，企业界寻求详细信息
item.description: 如果明年各国能够提出气候计划，并为市场和投资制定明确的政策，那么 COP29 就金融和碳市场达成的协议将为商业世界带来数十亿美元的资金流。【原文：COP29 deals on finance and carbon markets could lead to billions more dollars flowing around the business world if countries next year can deliver climate plans with clear policies for markets and investment.】

item.title: 美元随国债提名债券收益率下滑
item.description: 周一，由于美国财长人选似乎安抚了债券市场，并拉低了收益率，削弱了美元的部分汇率优势，美元稍稍回吐了近期涨幅。【原文：The dollar relinquished a little of its recent gains on Monday as the pick for U.S. Treasury secretary seemed to reassure the bond market and pulled yields lower, shaving some of the currency's rate advantage.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普财政部长人选斯科特-贝森特将优先考虑减税政策
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特在周日发表的一篇采访中告诉《华尔街日报》，他将优先兑现大选时的减税承诺。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's nominee for U.S. Treasury secretary, Scott Bessent, will prioritize delivering on election tax cut pledges, he told the Wall Street Journal in an interview published on Sunday.】

item.title: IPO 冻结促使投资者行使赎回权，中国初创企业受挫
item.description: 业内高管表示，由于未能在约定时间内通过上市实现退出，中国初创企业正越来越多地面临早期风险投资人要求归还投资或面临诉讼的困境。【原文：Chinese startups are increasingly struggling with demands from early-stage venture capitalists to return their investment or face lawsuits, after failing to provide an exit via a market listing within an agreed time frame, industry executives said.】

item.title: 投资者权衡美国贿赂指控，阿达尼债券创一年新低
item.description: 阿达尼美元债券价格周一跌至近一年来的低点，因为在美国当局提出贿赂和欺诈指控后，投资者削减了对这家印度企业集团的投资。【原文：Adani dollar bond prices fell to almost one-year lows on Monday as investors cut their exposure to the Indian conglomerate in the wake of bribery and fraud allegations from U.S. authorities.】

item.title: 美国计划将英特尔 85 亿美元的联邦芯片补助金降至 80 亿美元以下 - 纽约时报
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周日援引未具名消息人士的话报道，美国政府计划将英特尔公司初步获得的 85 亿美元联邦芯片补助金削减至 80 亿美元以下。【原文：The U.S. government plans to reduce Intel Corp's preliminary $8.5 billion federal chips grant to less than $8 billion, the New York Times reported on Sunday citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 俄罗斯和伊朗紧张局势支撑油价，油价维持在两周高位
item.description: 由于西方大国与主要产油国俄罗斯和伊朗之间的地缘政治紧张局势加剧，增加了供应中断的风险，油价继上周上涨6%之后，周一徘徊在两周高点附近。【原文：Oil prices hovered near two-week highs on Monday following 6% gains last week, as geopolitical tensions heightened between western powers and major oil producers Russia and Iran, raising risks of supply disruption.】

item.title: 由于发动机问题持续存在，新西兰航空公司 2025 年上半年盈利下降
item.description: 新西兰航空公司（Air New Zealand）周一表示，由于全球发动机维护延误导致飞机可用性问题，该公司持续存在的发动机问题进一步影响了其盈利底线，预计 2025 财年上半年盈利将有所下降。【原文：Air New Zealand's persistent engine issues further bit into its bottomline, as it forecast lower earnings for the first half of financial year 2025, as global engine maintenance delays caused aircraft availability issues, the airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 贝森特当选美国财政部部长，债券期货反弹
item.description: 由于投资者对基金经理斯科特-贝森特被任命为下一任美国财政部长感到高兴，认为他将成为华盛顿市场的代言人，周一早盘债券反弹，美国股票期货上涨，美元汇率回落。【原文：Bonds rallied, U.S. stock futures rose and the dollar eased in early trade on Monday as investors cheered the appointment of fund manager Scott Bessent as the next U.S. Treasury secretary, figuring he would be a voice for markets in Washington.】

item.title: 贝森特选秀后美元随国债收益率下跌
item.description: 周一，由于投资者认为美国财政部长的人选将安抚债券市场，并使收益率走低，从而削弱了美元的部分汇率优势，美元稍稍回吐了近期的涨幅。【原文：The dollar surrendered a little of its recent gains on Monday as investors assumed the pick for U.S. Treasury secretary would reassure the bond market and pulled yields lower, shaving some of the dollar's rate advantage.】
